useGuard(BotClient, Player, Player) - Method in class game.GameActions
When you discard the Guard, choose a player and name a number (other than 1).
useHandmaiden(BotClient, Player) - Method in class game.GameActions
When you discard the Handmaid, you are immune to the effects of other players’ cards until the start of your next turn.
useKing(Player, Player) - Method in class game.GameActions
When you discard King Arnaud IV, trade the card in your hand with the card held by another player of your choice.
usePriest(BotClient, Player, Player) - Method in class game.GameActions
When you discard the Priest, you can look at another player’s hand.
usePrince(Player, Deck) - Method in class game.GameActions
When you discard Prince Arnaud, choose one player still in the round (including yourself).
usePrincess(BotClient, Player) - Method in class game.GameActions
If you discard the Princess—no matter how or why—she has tossed your letter into the fire.
